name: Magical Mysteries: Path of the Sorceress
description: Magical Mysteries is a game of brain-teasing puzzles and fast-paced match-3 battles in a magical 3D fantasy world. Search for enchanted scrolls, make useful potions and beat your mysterious enemies! Improve your spells and unravel the story of the Sorceress.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and above Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB video card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP and above Processor: 1.5 Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB video card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
